name: Football Sanity Shield
tagline: Hide the football internet after a bad result — any club
description:
Arsenal Sanity Shield for every English football fan.

Pick your club, pick your competitions, and forget about it. When your team loses or draws, the extension quietly hides football content across the web. No results, no hot takes, no crying-face thumbnails. You just browse normally.

Supports any English club across six competitions — Premier League, Champions League, Europa League, Conference League, FA Cup, and League Cup. Per-competition toggles let you choose whether to block on loss only, or loss and draw.

changes.text: Pick any English club from a full dropdown — Premier League, Championship, and beyond
6 competitions: Premier League, Champions League, Europa League, Conference League, FA Cup, League Cup
Options page — per-competition block toggles (block on loss only, or loss + draw)
Club switcher always visible in popup; also on the options page
Champions League knockout tracking — eliminated clubs silently hidden, no badge shown
Vercel backend API with secret validation and 30-minute edge cache
First-run experience — club picker prompt until a club is selected
Auto-refresh via Chrome storage listener — popup updates without close/reopen
Animated loading spinner while extension checks scores
Renamed from EPL Sanity Shield — avoids Premier League trademark
